TopicTitle: Do you browse the KSP forum more than other social networks?

Articles.Content: Feel free to take the poll and discus.
I am here almost all the time. This forum has a permanent tab on all browsers.
I always go to the forums, if it were my pc, would have a permanent bar in the browser .... but not so

The other thing I browse like hell is tumblr, I think they are equals to me now.

Exept here I can have interaction with other peoples instead of rebloging memes and money cats all day and maybe having a two post conversation with like, 2 dudes.

I always go to the forums, if it were my pc, would have a permanent bar in the browser .... but not so

Yeah, i have it on both phone and pc browsers as a permanent tab.
I browse the forums about 3x more than I do anything else.
*KSP forum only answer intensifies* hahaha

Son, the KSP forums is my social media. I have Facebook, although I rarely use it, in fact I only got it so I could join school groups and stuff also to stalk my friends... I mean uh... for... for nothing else... really... just school groups...

If you direct your attention to the left, where my profile information is displayed, you will see my thoughts about Twitter and social media sites in general.

KSP Forums is life for me now.
I second that.

There's this political board that I browse and post a LOT more on than the KSP forum. I won't mention it here since it's politics (and I might get railed at if I post it anyway), but if anybody really, really wants to know feel free to email me.

Edited October 30, 2015 by Flymetothemun
I browse here much more often that whenever I type "f" in the link bar, the suggestion has become "Forum.kerbalspaceprogram" instead of Facebook, which probably comes second.

I even have an order of what website goes to what browser tab and which is opened first. It looks like this:

Kerbal Space Program - Youtube - Everything else

Even when I'll do nothing in one of the two, it's like a ritual.

Also, wow. 33 voters and no one has voted for Twitter OR Facebook yet.

Who voted subreddit? WHO DID IT?

Just kidding.

I browse here much more often that whenever I type "f" in the link bar, the suggestion has become "Forum.kerbalspaceprogram" instead of Facebook, which probably comes second.

I browse the forums so much, when I type R to get to reddit, the forums are actually first because of the r in forum

I spend some time on the forum.

I can't even into reddit.

I follow some official and unofficial KSP stuff on Facebook/Twitter, but I don't pay a lot of attention to either.
I'm here so often, the only letters I can type into my URL bar without getting something forum-related are h, j, n, and y.
I used to, but my activity has kind of dropped lately. I'm not sure why.
I'm big on the KSP forums, especially with my channel.

Permanent KSP forum lurker reporting in.

Then again, I haven't checked my facebook for the last two years so that has to say something...

I spend some time on the forum.

I can't even into reddit.

I follow some official and unofficial KSP stuff on Facebook/Twitter, but I don't pay a lot of attention to either.

A likely story. I suppose spending "some" time here explains the 10.5k posts since 2012?

I spend too much time, time that could be spent

a) Working.

Playing KSP.

c) Attending to my personal life.
I literally don't even have a Facebook or Twitter account. Which also means that I am being out-social-media-d by the 77-year-old rabbi at my local Jewish synagogue. Ouch.
Yes. As of now I have 23 forum tabs open.
Considering that I am not a member of Twitbook or Facetagram, yes, I do browse the KSP forums more than other networks.

All Right The only links in my Bookmarks are forum Links.

Also Might I just point out that the poll closed with EXACTLY 69 voters on the ksp forum option?... no?... Nobody thinks it is funny?... Alright I'll Just go
I used to, but nowadays I've been consumed by reddit
